alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:05PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of south central Weber...northeastern Davis and western Morgan Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 805 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow winds over South Weber, or near Layton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Clinton, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Marriott-Slaterville, Uintah, Weber State University, West Haven, West Point, Sunset, Fruit Heights and Wilson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 327 and 344. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
